select rnum, pc.category_no, pc.product_id, pc.product_name, pc.price, pc.product_img, pc.category_name, pc.detail_category_name from ( select p.*, c.category_name, c.detail_category_name, row_number()
over(order by price)
over(order by price desc)
over(order by product_name)
as rnum from product p, category c where p.category_no = c.category_no and c.category_name = #{categoryName} ) pc where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber}
select count(*) from product p, seller s, category c where p.seller_id = s.seller_id and p.category_no = c.category_no and c.category_name = #{categoryName}

select p.*, c.* from product p, category c where p.category_no = c.category_no and c.category_name = #{categoryName} and c.detail_category_name = #{detailCategoryName}
order by price
order by price desc
order by product_name
select detail_category_name from category where category_name = #{value}
